attributes.action: Grant Walter Tull a postumous military medal in lieu of his Bravery and leadership in being the First black officer in the british army,andbreaking down the racial barriers in this country that excisted in those times.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Walter Tull deserves to receive a postmous military medal as he was reccomended but it was never awarded for his military service in the first world war,and being one of the first Black people to break down the racial barriers in this country.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with the Ministry of Defence.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
